About Me

BIO

Full Stack JavaScript Developer with an interest in a variety of content and ideas. I am a self taught programmer who learned HTML in high school and went back to teach myself responsive web design and JavaScript Data Structures and Algorithms to work with JavaScript frameworks. I attended college for a career as a Firefighter/Paramedic, however, I discovered while working as an Emergency Medical Technician that the cultural fit wasn't for me; furthermore, I have decided to put a purpose to my passion and break into tech to work as a software engineer and build products and services that make a significant impact on the world.I have learned React to build complex UI interfaces and I enjoy working in teams in person to communicate and share ideas and learn from fellow developers to expand my knowledge with an openness to learn new technologies.
